description: This file defines a Flutter widget 'FilterScreen' that provides a user interface for filtering options such as hair colors, races, religions, and height/weight ranges. It interacts with a state provider 'FilterProvider' to read and update filter criteria.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A stateful widget providing UI for filtering options such as hair color, race, religion, height, and weight.

classes.name: _FilterScreenState
classes.description: State class managing local filter range values and building the filter UI.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes local filter ranges from the 'FilterProvider' criteria.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, including checkboxes for categories, range sliders for height and weight, and action buttons.
